Labeling shiny app

Source: R/shiny_labels.R, R/shiny_visualisation.R
shiny_labels.Rd

Shiny app to do the labeling based on crowns images.

Shiny app to do the visualise the crowns data (labels and rgb indices).

Usage

shiny_labels(data_labeling)

shiny_labels(data_labeling)

Arguments

data_labeling

tibble. Labeling file resulting from the create_labelingFile

Examples


library(canObsR)

data(data_labeling)
data_labeling
